website_summaries.verdict: One of Nike’s most eye-catching and innovative shoes, the LunarEpic Flyknit becomes an all-weather shoe with the inclusion of a water-repellent upper and water resistant cleatie. The Shield version of the LunarEpic Flyknit continues to have a snug, socklike wrap up until around the ankle due to the revolutionary mid-rise design. It is very light, extremely comfortable, offers good arch support, and loads of traction. If the price is well within reach, the shoe is easily one of the best in the business.
pros: A large number of reviewers swear by the comfort delivered by the Shield version of the LunarEpic Flyknit
The inclusion of the water-repellent upper and inner sleeve gives it better protection when the conditions get a bit cold or wet
Several noticed how breathable the shoe remains despite the water resistant upper
Flywire cables hold the foot down in security and support
A handful noticed just how flexible the shoe is
The traction is surprisingly superb on wet conditions, based on the observations of some runners
It comes with a set of 4mm sockliners
A few used the shoe for long-distance running or for up-tempo runs
A couple of expert reviewers found the cushioning to be very good in absorbing shock
It is good for distance running or even racing when the weather forecast isn’t too good
A handful of runners said that the 10mm drop feels much lower, like a 6mm drop
cons: An already expensive shoe becomes even more expensive in the LunarEpic Flyknit Shield
A handful found the fit to be too narrow
The mid-rise design was a bit weird and funny for some runners
Some runners complained about irritation on their ankles or Achilles due to the mid-rise design
Small stones are sucked into the outsole
A handful were disappointed that it runs small

customer_reviews.title: GO A HALF SIZE UP
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 7.5 as my normal size in Nike's. My foot was right at the edge of the shoe. I've returned them and will order an 8. My mom has these shoes and loves them - they offer great support. The shoe box, however, was damaged when i got it, like it was a recycled box. Overall the show is good, runs slighty small, I recommend going a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: K&J

customer_reviews.title: A great Nike product.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for walking/jogging. Excellent ankle and heel support. Wide area for toes where they can spread out comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Shoes that fit like socks and feel like air, but you can run a literal MARATHON in them.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, ran a marathon in them :). These babies have the support of a sturdier shoe but the feel of Frees.
customer_reviews.author: Edge

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of these shoes but they were just ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of these shoes but they were just a bit too snug. Debated on getting the next size up and decided against it. I like them but I didn't love them. They do feel like wearing a sock with a sole so that was interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I luv these shoes. This is my second pair. Comfortable but has some stability. I will order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Scott

customer_reviews.title: Soft shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes but run super small I had to send mine bck coz they were reali tight and giving me a punishing feel .. not for wide feet at all
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Great foot/ankle support also comfortable for extended walking
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for high activity and foot support but My only con is the sole of the shoe isn’t slip resistant even though the shoe is water resistant. So dont wear these shoes in the rain or expect to slip and possibly fall.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Best ankle support out there. This pair is also water resistant which is great for outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: EJ S

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been a runner for 40+ years amd these running shoes are the best support in my ankles and move with my feet perfectly. I won't run in anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in a size 7 for my daughter and they fit me snug and I wear a 6 1/2. If you plan on purchasing this shoes, definitely order a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Monica T.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable authenticity
customer_reviews.text: Not convinced these were authentic Nike’s. They don’t feel the same way as my real flyknits
customer_reviews.author: Kara Stevi

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with these
customer_reviews.text: Bought my girlfriend these shoes because i has bought myself a pair for running. She loves them. As do i
customer_reviews.author: B MAJOR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for both walking and running, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Went on a Japan trip with these shoes and they’re amazing for both running and traveling. Didn’t make my feet sore at all
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe looks great on the feet; very stylish and comfortable. Does not earn 5 stars because it's a bit tight. I'm generally a size 11, but I would rather have bought a 11.5 for more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Vigi

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: Second pair. You need a thin sock. They are narrow across the laces. I like these as casual shoe and for short runs. Not enough support for lots of miles.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Marchesi

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Niece loves these shoes, fits her perfectly. Had to mail back the first shoes because my niece grew more than I expected.. Exchange was quick and simple. ..
customer_reviews.author: Barbes

customer_reviews.title: Too tight even for narrow foot
customer_reviews.text: Way too snug around the arch. This was the second pair we ordered. She’s a 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes just be careful when you wash them
customer_reviews.text: Good for every activity. Look up how to properly wash or clean so they don’t shrink
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Nike used to have better quality.
customer_reviews.text: These only lasted six months. I have a pair I bought three years ago that while worn, still work great. Maybe Nike is going downhill.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Traction in wet weather
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the traction it has in the rain and very lightweight. It is my go-to race shoe and trainer for wet weather
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Ferranti

customer_reviews.title: Only for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, but too tight for me. Very narrow in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Oriana Halverson

customer_reviews.title: ... the first time she wore them but loves how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé thought that there were a little tight the first time she wore them but loves how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos P

customer_reviews.title: This shoes is very good in general
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very good in general, very flexible and so comfortable. But the big issue here is the sizing it's small, you have to order one size up.
customer_reviews.author: Zahrani

customer_reviews.title: Great support for Runners
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to break them in but they’re good running shoes
customer_reviews.author: Anabel

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: the only reason i’m giving 4 stars is because the shoes were more pink, than the red I expected. shipping was quick & the shoes fit perfectly! I am normally a size 7.5, but I order all nike’s 8.5 so they were true to size. they came in a box & with the extra inserts. love them!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Comfy after breaking in
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable! The water repel works great! Not a lot of traction for running on wet streets. Has a little bump in the back that took some breaking in, where the ankle part meets the shoe, other than that they are fantastically comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable running shoes I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite running shoes. Lightweight and comfortable with plenty of cushioning for when I run.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have held up well. After a couple of months, I have machine washed 2-3 x's and they clean up great. My son says they make him faster :)
customer_reviews.author: c. smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the shoe but the size was to narrow making it uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan McLeish

customer_reviews.title: Packaging not original
customer_reviews.text: Though the shoes seem new and unused the Nike box was cut in half with no lid.
customer_reviews.author: Trisia A Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Wears it daily to school and practice
customer_reviews.text: My son can only find his size in women sizes when it comes to This style. These are his second pair and he absolutely loves them. He is very active and wears almost daily to school and practice.
customer_reviews.author: Randa

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old son loves these shoes. This ...
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son loves these shoes. This is his third pair. I wish they would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

product_meta.title: Nike Women's 849665-001 Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Original and exklusive sport products by Nike
